name: Eva
dialogue: You know, I've been thinking a lot about self-care lately. What are some ways you guys like to unwind and relax?

name: Frank
dialogue: Ah, great topic! For me, it's all about finding time for exercise. Whether it's a run or yoga, physical activity helps clear my mind.

name: Cathy
dialogue: I'm more of a laughter therapy kind of girl. Nothing beats a good comedy show or hanging out with friends who make me laugh.

name: Frank
dialogue: That's great, Cathy! Laughter is definitely important too.

name: Eva
dialogue: Yeah, it's all about finding what works for each person, right? What do you think is the biggest challenge to maintaining self-care,
